## Acceptance Criteria

<!-- Check the criteria it meets (can be more than one) -->

- [ ] **(a) Widely recommended** - It is widely recommended by the community
- [ ] **(b) Highly discussed** - It generates active discussion due to its innovative nature
- [ ] **(c) Unique in its approach** - It has an absolutely unique approach and function
- [ ] **(d) Niche product** - It fills a specific gap
